Rule: Obtaining a higher educational degree (Bachelors, Masters, Prof-school, Doctorate) increases the likelihood of earning more than $50K.
Altering the number of hours worked per week, particularly increasing to 54 hours, can positively impact income.
Changing the workclass from Private to Government can increase the likelihood of earning more than $50K.
Marital status may have a nuanced impact in conjunction with other factors like education.
Minor changes in age are less impactful compared to education, work hours, and workclass.
